column6: BRANDED BY BATTLE! ABSOLVED BY BLOOD! For STEVE ROGERS and DEVIL DINOSAUR...there is no end to HULK, no promise of salvation. Crawl in the mud and the blood, until the claws of death reach your throat! THERE IS NO ESCAPE...PLANET HULK IS INSIDE US ALL!
column8: | writer:Sam Humphries | artist:Marc Laming | penciller (cover):Michael Del Mundo
